headline: What Host Hotels & Resorts (HST)'s Q4 Earnings Setup and Positive Catalyst Watch Status Means For Shareholders
summary: Host Hotels & Resorts is set to report its fiscal Q4 2025 earnings on February 18, with analysts expecting year-over-year growth in funds from operations and continued strength following a robust third-quarter performance and a US$400 million senior notes offering due in 2028. Analyst sentiment has turned more constructive as firms add Host Hotels & Resorts to “Positive Catalyst Watch,” citing strong RevPAR trends and anticipation that upcoming guidance could exceed current market...

headline: Is Host Hotels & Resorts (HST) Pricing Reflecting Its Recent Share Performance?
summary: If you are wondering whether Host Hotels & Resorts is offering fair value at its current share price, you are not alone. This article is here to unpack that question clearly. The stock last closed at US$18.81, with returns of 1.8% over 7 days, 2.5% over 30 days, 3.6% year to date, 14.3% over 1 year, 20.1% over 3 years, and 59.7% over 5 years.
